name: MINI FPS - Retro First-Person Shooter - WIP
name_original: MINI FPS - Retro First-Person Shooter - WIP
description:
This is my first video game, and it's fairly simple, it's based off of a Unity Microgame Template, but changed the level round, added some enemies and postprocessing effects to make it look kind of retro. I will be bringing updates in the future (more levels and polishing) I hope you enjoy playing it!

(Controls are in the menu - Keyboard and Controller compatible)
